articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: India’s Tata and Europe’s Airbus sign deal to manufacture helicopters - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The agreement was signed during French President Macron’s state visit to the South Asian country.
articles.content:
Indias Tata Group and Europes Airbus have signed an agreement to manufacture civilian helicopters together.
The deal was signed during French President Emmanuel Macrons state visit to India, Indian … [+2395 chars]
